code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{auth}from'../util';import jwt from'jsonwebtoken';var initialState={user_token:auth.getUser()||null};var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setUser:function setUser(state,action){state.user_token=action.payload;auth.setUser(action.payload);},deleteUser:function deleteUser(state,action){state.user_token=null;auth.deleteUser();}}});export var getUserToken=function getUserToken(state){return state.auth.user_token;};export var getUserDecode=function getUserDecode(state){return state.auth.user_token!==null?jwt.decode(state.auth.user_token):null;};export var authAction=authSlice.actions;export var authReducer=authSlice.reducer;
